projects.name: Kinect Mouse Tracker
projects.short: Kinect Mouse Tracker processes live Microsoft kinect data to deduce a mouse's position inside an enclosed pen. Made during my internship at NERF (Neuro-Electronics Research Flanders, part of IMEC).

projects.name: DSpay - Digital School Pay
projects.short: DSpay is my high-school thesis which researches the viability and implements a prototype of a digital payment system at school.

projects.name: Osm Contact Info Corrector
projects.short: Osm Contact Info Corrector is a webapp to add and correct contact info on openstreetmap.

projects.name: Trend-Friends
projects.short: A school assignment to make a static, accessible site.

projects.name: Dorm Controller 9000
projects.short: Dorm Controller 9000 is a hobby project that smoothly wakes me up by controlling several relays and an rgb led strip using a custom HTTP server running on a ESP-12E microcontroller.

projects.name: Ubokeh
projects.short: My Unnecessary Badly-Documented and Overly Complicated Esp Http-Server is the heart of DCNT [TODO: link].

projects.name: Sel
projects.short: The Sel Embedded Logger combined with the Sel Tcp Log Server form my logging solution for DCNT.

projects.name: This site ;)
projects.short: This site is hosted by github pages and runs Vue.js.
